definitions.text: empty rhetoric or insincere or exaggerated talk
examples: don't give me any of that jazz

definitions.text: a genre of popular music that originated in New Orleans around 1900 and developed through increasingly complex styles
a style of dance music popular in the 1920s; similar to New Orleans jazz but played by large bands
play something in the style of jazz

examples: This student sleeps with everyone in her dorm
Were you ever intimate with this man?
